extendedInfo.description: Do you know who the fastest character is Gauntlet is? Does the term "Grumble Grumble" conjure images of meat? Do you find yourself sitting home on the weekends playing Rad Racer with the 3D glasses on? If you answer yes to any of these questions then this is the quiz app for you! 101 questions to test your NES knowledge.

reviews.comment: Fantastic questions, obviously by a classic gamer. Kudos!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t allow 100%
reviews.comment: I\'m a hardcore old-school gamer. These questions are great. Only reason I didn\'t give this app 5 stars is because it appears to be impossible to receive a 100%. I\'ve gotten all the questions right 3 different times and it still says 99% at the end. Would love to see 8-bit Trivia 2!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Promising
reviews.comment: Well thought-out questions cover the classics and many lesser-knowns. I\'d like to see this polished and expanded. My score: 85%
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitch
reviews.comment: It asked me how many fragments of the triforce link has to get in LOZ and the answer is either 2 or 3 but those weren\'t options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I got a 68 my first try......thought id do better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okayy, but...
reviews.comment: Three stars because several facts are incorrect. It\'s \"Fester\'s Quest\" not Uncle Fester Quest and the Triforce of Power is received after defeating. Gann on, not another fragment of the Triforce of Wizdom. It\'s a trivia game; GET YOUR FACTS STRAIGHT!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like the questions. 5stars if u Use all the screen space. Putting the answers so close, caused a few accidental clicks and graphics would be nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good questions. I know this is in early development, but online play and shorter question sets with incentives would be cool.
reviews.author: A Google User
